metadata.title: CVE-2019-12098 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In the client side of Heimdal before 7.6.0, failure to verify anonymousPKINIT PA-PKINIT-KX key exchange permits a man-in-the-middle attack. Thisissue is in krb5_init_creds_step in lib/krb5/init_creds_pw.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
heimdal-kcm - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
heimdal-kdc - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
heimdal-multidev - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
heimdal-servers - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libasn1-8-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libgssapi3-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libhcrypto4-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libhdb9-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libheimbase1-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libheimntlm0-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libhx509-5-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libkadm5clnt7-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libkadm5srv8-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libkafs0-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libkdc2-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libkrb5-26-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libotp0-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libroken18-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libsl0-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
libwind0-heimdal - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: heimdal package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm1').
